title: User Signup and Email Verification Flow
description: Verify that a new user can sign up, receive an email verification, and verify their email to activate the account.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Fill in valid email and password fields.
Submit the signup form.
Check that user receives an email verification link.
Simulate clicking the email verification link.
Verify that the account is activated and user is redirected appropriately.

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid email or wrong password.
Click login button.
Check that an error message is displayed and login is denied.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that a user can request a password reset, receive an email, and set a new password successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Enter registered email and submit password reset request.
Check that password reset email is sent.
Simulate clicking the reset link from email.
Enter new valid password and submit.
Verify password reset is successful and user can log in with new password.

title: AI Agent Configuration with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a user can successfully save AI agent configuration including business name, system prompt, voice selection, and knowledge base upload.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to AI Agent Configuration page.
Enter a valid business name.
Enter a system prompt within 10,000 characters.
Select a valid voice option.
Upload knowledge base files within allowed size.
Save the configuration.
Verify that configuration is saved without errors and system prompt persists after reload.

title: AI Agent Configuration Input Validation
description: Check that empty business names, system prompts over 10,000 characters, and knowledge base files larger than 50 MB are rejected with friendly error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Agent Configuration page.
Leave business name empty and try to save.
Confirm error message indicating business name cannot be empty.
Enter system prompt longer than 10,000 characters and try to save.
Confirm error message indicating system prompt is too long.
Attempt to upload knowledge base file larger than 50 MB.
Confirm upload is rejected with appropriate error message.

title: File Upload Auto-save and Validation
description: Verify that knowledge base files are automatically saved immediately after upload and validated securely.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Agent Configuration upload section.
Upload valid knowledge base document.
Check that file is auto-saved without user needing to manually save.
Verify that file is validated and stored securely.

title: Voice Call Testing for Free Tier Using Vapi.ai
description: Validate voice call testing feature uses Vapi.ai TTS for users on the free subscription tier.

steps.description: Log in as a free tier user.
Initiate voice call test from dashboard.
Verify that Vapi.ai voice is used for TTS in the call.
Confirm call completes successfully and logs are generated.

title: Voice Call Testing for Paid Tiers Using Minimax TTS
description: Verify voice calls for Professional or Pro tier use Minimax TTS and support advanced voice features.

steps.description: Log in as a Professional or Pro tier user.
Initiate voice call test.
Confirm Minimax TTS is used for the voice call.
Verify advanced voice features are enabled during the call.

title: Call Event Logging via Vapi Webhook
description: Ensure that voice call events are logged into the Supabase database via the Vapi webhook upon call completion.

steps.description: Complete a voice call through the system.
Verify that Vapi webhook is triggered upon call completion.
Check Supabase database for accurate call log entries.

title: Rate Limiting Enforcement on API Endpoints
description: Test that the system enforces a maximum of 100 calls/hour per assistant on free tier and returns HTTP 429 status on excessive calls.

steps.description: Log in as free tier user.
Make 100 voice call requests within one hour.
Verify all requests are processed successfully.
Make the 101st call request within the same hour.
Check that HTTP 429 Too Many Requests response is returned.

title: Health Check Endpoint Returns 200 When Healthy
description: Validate that the health check endpoint returns HTTP 200 status when the system and database are reachable and healthy.

steps.description: Call the health check endpoint under normal operational conditions.
Verify that HTTP 200 status is returned.

title: Health Check Endpoint Returns 503 When Database Unreachable
description: Ensure health check endpoint returns HTTP 503 service unavailable status when the database is unreachable.

steps.description: Simulate database downtime or disconnection.
Call the health check endpoint.
Confirm HTTP 503 status is returned indicating service is unavailable.

title: Dashboard Displays Call History and Analytics Accurately
description: Verify the calls dashboard shows accurate real-time call logs, history, and analytics data corresponding to webhook events.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Calls dashboard.
Trigger multiple calls and ensure webhook call logs are created.
Verify call history is updated and analytics data reflects recent calls accurately.

title: Lead Management Captures Leads from Calls and Chat
description: Ensure that leads captured from voice calls and chat interactions appear in the leads dashboard for management.

steps.description: Simulate customer interactions via voice calls and chat widgets.
Navigate to Leads management dashboard.
Verify that all new leads from interactions are listed and can be managed.

title: Subscription Tier Detection Enables/Disables Features Correctly
description: Verify that the system correctly detects user subscription tiers and enables or disables premium voice and chat features accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as a free tier user and view available features.
Check that advanced premium features are disabled or hidden.
Log in as a Professional or Pro tier user.
Verify that premium voice and chat features are enabled and accessible.

title: Payment Subscription Management and History Display
description: Verify users can view and manage subscription payments including Starter, Professional, and Pro plans with accurate payment history listing.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Payments page.
Check subscription status and plan details.
View payment history list.
Verify all information is accurate, up to date, and consistent with backend data.

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Navigation Accessibility
description: Ensure that the UI layout, navigation elements, and interaction flows are fully functional and appropriately responsive on mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the application on various mobile devices or emulators.
Navigate through main dashboards, AI configuration, calls, leads, and settings.
Verify responsive behavior, readable text, accessible navigation, and no UI breakage.

title: Protected Routes Enforce Authentication
description: Verify unauthenticated users are redirected to login and authenticated users have access to protected routes with loading states properly handled.

steps.description: Access a protected page URL while logged out.
Verify user is redirected to login or signup page.
Log in and access the same protected page.
Confirm access is granted and loading states display correctly before content loads.

title: Global Error Boundary Catches and Displays Errors
description: Ensure that unhandled React errors in the application UI are caught by the global ErrorBoundary and an informative error message is displayed to the user.

steps.description: Manually trigger a runtime error in a component (simulate failure).
Verify the application does not crash and an error boundary UI shows with error information.

title: End-to-End User Flow from Signup to Call Logging
description: Validate full end-to-end user experience: signup, email verification, login, AI agent setup, voice call testing, call webhook logging, and dashboard analytics with no console errors.

steps.description: Perform user signup and verify email.
Log into the system.
Configure AI agent including business name, system prompt, and voice selection.
Upload knowledge base file.
Initiate and complete voice call test.
Check call logs and analytics update on dashboard.
Verify no errors appear in browser console throughout the process.

title: System Supports 100 Simultaneous Free Tier Users
description: Verify the platform handles 100 simultaneous users on the free tier without failures or degraded performance.

steps.description: Simulate 100 concurrent users performing login, AI agent configuration, and call testing.
Verify system maintains stability, responsiveness, and no errors or crashes occur.

title: Uptime Monitoring Shows 99%+ Uptime Post-Launch
description: Confirm that uptime monitoring services report system uptime of at least 99% during the first 48 hours after deployment.

steps.description: Deploy the system to production.
Review UptimeRobot or equivalent monitoring reports over 48 hours.
Confirm recorded uptime is above 99%.
